mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanjing_name as huanjingName ,a.huanjing_photo as huanjingPhoto ,a.huanjing_types as huanjingTypes ,a.huanjing_content as huanjingContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huanjing a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huanjing_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanjingName},'%')
and a.huanjing_types = #{params.huanjingTypes}
and a.huanjing_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanjingContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
